task: Plan a multi-continent zero-waste business expo that integrates AR-guided exhibitions, renewable-powered live streaming, eco-friendly transport logistics, green-certified cuisine for all participants, and an advanced environmental impact assessment tool across event activities.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Coordinator responsible for organizing a multi-continent zero-waste business expo with all associated sustainable activities.

agents.name: expo_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Leads the planning of the expo, managing regional execution with sustainability standards.

agents.name: continent_event_director_agent
agents.role: Manages preparations in specific continents, ensuring alignment with global zero-waste goals.

agents.name: ar_exhibition_technician_agent
agents.role: Sets up and maintains AR-guided exhibitions, ensuring interactive engagement.

agents.name: interactive_design_specialist_agent
agents.role: Develops interactive AR content for enhancing visitor experiences at exhibitions.

agents.name: sustainability_expert_agent
agents.role: Ensures sustainable practices are embedded throughout all facets of the expo.

agents.name: transportation_manager_agent
agents.role: Organizes eco-friendly transportation solutions for participants.

agents.name: green_mobility_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Administrates hybrid and green vehicle logistics for attendee transport.

agents.name: culinary_services_agent
agents.role: Coordinates provision of green-certified cuisine for participants.

agents.name: sustainable_cuisine_operator_agent
agents.role: Facilitates eco-friendly dining options through local, sustainable sources.

agents.name: farm_to_table_supplier_agent
agents.role: Supplies sustainably sourced, local produce for catering services.

agents.name: digital_media_lead_agent
agents.role: Manages digital platforms and ensures renewable-powered live streaming.

agents.name: live_streaming_engineer_agent
agents.role: Oversees technical implementation of live streams powered by renewables.

agents.name: eco_impact_agent
agents.role: Implements and assesses the environmental impact of the expo operations.

agents.name: impact_analysis_system_agent
agents.role: Analyzes data to provide insights on environmental impacts.

agents.name: marketing_director_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies to enhance global engagement and outreach.

agents.name: global_engagement_officer_agent
agents.role: Maximizes global audience interaction and engagement.

agents.name: regional_vendor_liaison_agent
agents.role: Cooperates with regional vendors to ensure compliance with eco-friendly guidelines.

agents.name: global_sustainability_advisor_agent
agents.role: Provides advice on maintaining global sustainability standards across all expo activities.

agents.name: logistics_support_agent
agents.role: Offers logistical support, focusing on waste management and material reuse strategies.

tools.name: hybrid_vehicle_management_tool
tools.description: Manages and tracks hybrid vehicles for eco-friendly transportation during the expo.

route_map.description: Details of operational routes for fleet movement.

tools.name: catering_network_tool
tools.description: Connects with a network of local suppliers to ensure sustainably sourced catering options.

tools.name: renewable_energy_station_tool
tools.description: Sets up and manages renewable energy stations for live streaming services.

station_number.description: Number of renewable energy stations required.

power_output.description: Expected power output in kW per station.

tools.name: environmental_assessment_tool
tools.description: Evaluates the environmental footprint of expo operations and suggests adjustments.

tools.name: audience_outreach_metrics_tool
tools.description: Analyzes global audience engagement metrics to refine communication strategies.

time_period_days.description: Duration of the analysis period in days.
